titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that the United States Postal Service shall be subject to certain provisions of the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970.

bill.summary: 4/6/1987--Introduced. Makes all provisions of the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 applicable to the United States Postal Service, except those concerning: (1) civil and criminal penalties for willful violation causing death to an employee; and (2) reporting and program requirements for Federal agencies.
